alert.note: Alert for Cave Creek, New River; Deer Valley; New River Mesa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 07 at 3:46PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 430 PM MST... At 345 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over New River, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Scottsdale, New River, Cave Creek, Carefree, Lake Pleasant, Desert Mountain, Camp Creek, Anthem, and Seven Springs. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 220 and 241. AZ Route 74 between mile markers 21 and 30. AZ Route 303 between mile markers 130 and 139. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cave Creek, New River; Deer Valley; New River Mesa
